  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:S103_5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>S103_5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Meiosis and mitosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meiosis und Mitosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Méiose et mitose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meiosis e mitosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Meiosi e mitosi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Meiosis και mitosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Meiosis y mitosis</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">This Unit looks at how units if inheritance are transmitted from one generation to the next. First you will look at what happens to the chromosones of animals and plants during the process of sexual reproduciton. Then you will examine how genes are transmitted in particular patterns from generation to generation. These two approaches combine to illustrate how the patterns of inheritance can be explained by the behaviour of chromosomes during sexual reproduction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Chromosomes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Gene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Genotype</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Inheritance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Karyotype</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Meiosis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Mitosis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Phenotype</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit betrachtet wie Maßeinheiten, 
wenn Erbschaft von einem Erzeugung dem folgenden übermittelt wird. 
Zuerst betrachten Sie, was den chromosones der Tiere und der 
Betriebe während des Prozesses des sexuellen reproduciton geschieht. 
Dann überprüfen Sie, wie Gene übertragene insbesondere Muster
von Erzeugung zu Erzeugung sind. Diese zwei Annäherungen 
kombinieren, um zu veranschaulichen, wie die Muster der Erbschaft 
durch das Verhalten der Chromosomen während der sexuellen Wiedergabe 
erklärt werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité regarde comment des unités si la 
transmission sont transmises d'une génération au prochain. 
D'abord vous regarderez ce qui arrive aux chromosones des 
animaux et des usines pendant le processus du reproduciton sexuel. 
Alors vous examinerez comment les gènes sont en particulier les
configurations transmises de la génération à la génération. 
Ces deux approches combinent pour illustrer comment les 
configurations de la transmission peuvent être expliquées par le 
comportement des chromosomes pendant la reproduction sexuelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade olha como unidades se o inheritance 
for transmitido de uma geração ao seguinte. Primeiramente 
você olhará o que acontece aos chromosones dos animais e das plantas
durante o processo do reproduciton sexual. Então você 
examinará como os genes são transmitidos em testes padrões 
particulares da geração à geração. Estas duas 
aproximações combinam para ilustrar como os testes padrões do 
inheritance podem ser explicados pelo comportamento dos chromosomes 
durante a reprodução sexual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità guarda come unità se l'eredità è 
trasmessa da una generazione al seguente. In primo luogo 
guarderete che cosa accade ai chromosones degli animali e delle piante
durante il processo di reproduciton sessuale. Allora esaminerete
come i geni sono in particolare modelli trasmessi dalla generazione 
alla generazione. Questi due metodi uniscono per illustrare come
i modelli dell'eredità possono essere spiegati tramite il 
comportamento dei cromosomi durante la riproduzione sessuale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα εξετάζει το πώς μονάδες εάν η 
κληρονομιά διαβιβάζεται από μια γενεά στην επόμενη. Πρώτα 
θα εξετάσετε αυτό που συμβαίνει στα chromosones των ζώων και 
των φυτών κατά τη διάρκεια της διαδικασίας του σεξουαλικού 
reproduciton. Κατόπιν θα εξετάσετε πώς τα γονίδια 
διαβιβάζονται στα ιδιαίτερα πρότυπα από τη γενεά στη γενεά. 
Αυτές οι δύο προσεγγίσεις συνδυάζουν να επεξηγήσουν πώς τα
πρότυπα της κληρονομιάς μπορούν να εξηγηθούν από τη συμπεριφορά 
των χρωμοσωμάτων κατά τη διάρκεια της σεξουαλικής αναπαραγωγής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad mira cómo las unidades si la herencia
se transmite a partir de una generación al siguiente. Primero 
usted mirará qué sucede a los chromosones de animales y de plantas 
durante el proceso del reproduciton sexual. Entonces usted 
examinará cómo los genes se transmiten en modelos determinados de la
generación a la generación. Estos dos acercamientos combinan 
para ilustrar cómo los modelos de la herencia se pueden explicar por 
el comportamiento de cromosomas durante la reproducción sexual.</string>
          </description>
